I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth far more than its monetary value. Given its importance, I understand that it might be challenging for me to part with it without a substantial return. After careful consideration, I propose to sell the product to you for $1,250,000.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions regarding the product or the terms of the sale. I am open to discussing alternative arrangements that could benefit both parties.

Looking forward to your response,
Alice
